verses.verse: Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H4033><s%> his father had sojourned, <S%H1><s%> in the land <S%H4033><s%> of Canaan. <S%H776><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are [the records of] the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> when seventeen <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of age, <S%H1121><s%> was pasturing <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> with his brothers <S%H251><s%> while he was [still] a youth, <S%H5288><s%> along with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> his father's wives. <S%H1><s%> And Joseph <S%H802><s%> brought <S%H3130><s%> back a bad <S%H935><s%> <S%H1681><s%> report <S%H7451><s%> about them to their father.

Now Israel <S%H3478><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he was the son <S%H1121><s%> of his old <S%H2208><s%> age; <S%H2208><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> him a varicolored <S%H6446><s%> tunic. <S%H3801><s%>

And his brothers <S%H251><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that their father loved <S%H1><s%> him more <S%H157><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H4480><s%> his brothers; <S%H3605><s%> and [so] they hated <S%H251><s%> him and could <S%H8130><s%> not speak <S%H3201><s%> to him on friendly <S%H1696><s%> terms. <S%H7965><s%>

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and when he told <S%H5046><s%> it to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> they hated <S%H8130><s%> him even <S%H5750><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Please <S%H4994><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> dream <S%H2472><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have had; <S%H2492><s%>

for behold, <S%H2009><s%> we were binding <S%H481><s%> sheaves <S%H485><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and lo, <S%H2009><s%> my sheaf <S%H485><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up and also <S%H1571><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> erect; <S%H5324><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> your sheaves <S%H485><s%> gathered <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to my sheaf. <S%H485><s%> "

Then his brothers <S%H251><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Are you actually <S%H4427><s%> going to reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us? Or <S%H518><s%> are you really <S%H4910><s%> going to rule <S%H4910><s%> over us?" So they hated <S%H8130><s%> him even <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> for his dreams <S%H2472><s%> and for his words. <S%H1697><s%>

Now he had <S%H2492><s%> still <S%H5750><s%> another <S%H312><s%> dream, <S%H2472><s%> and related <S%H5608><s%> it to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Lo, <S%H2009><s%> I have had <S%H2492><s%> still <S%H5750><s%> another dream; <S%H2472><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> and eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> were bowing <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to me."

And he related <S%H5608><s%> [it] to his father and to his brothers; <S%H1><s%> and his father rebuked <S%H251><s%> him and said <S%H1><s%> to him, "What <S%H1605><s%> is this <S%H559><s%> dream <S%H4100><s%> that you have had <S%H2088><s%>? Shall I and your mother <S%H2472><s%> and your brothers <S%H2492><s%> actually <S%H517><s%> come <S%H251><s%> to bow <S%H935><s%> ourselves down <S%H935><s%> before you to the ground <S%H7812><s%>?"
And his brothers <S%H251><s%> were jealous <S%H7065><s%> of him, but his father kept <S%H1><s%> the saying <S%H8104><s%> [in mind.]
Then his brothers <S%H251><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to pasture <S%H7462><s%> their father's flock <S%H6629><s%> in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Are not your brothers <S%H251><s%> pasturing <S%H7462><s%> [the flock] in Shechem <S%H7927><s%>? Come, <S%H1980><s%> and I will send <S%H7971><s%> you to them." And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "I will go. <S%H2009><s%>"

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Go <S%H1980><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> about the welfare <S%H7965><s%> of your brothers <S%H251><s%> and the welfare <S%H7965><s%> of the flock; <S%H6629><s%> and bring <S%H7725><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to me." So he sent <S%H7971><s%> him from the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and he came <S%H935><s%> to Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And a man <S%H376><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> him, and behold, <S%H2009><s%> he was wandering <S%H8582><s%> in the field; <S%H7704><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him, "What <S%H4100><s%> are you looking <S%H1245><s%> for?"
And he said, <S%H559><s%> "I am looking <S%H1245><s%> for my brothers; <S%H251><s%> please <S%H4994><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me where <S%H375><s%> they are pasturing <S%H7462><s%> [the flock.]"

Then the man <S%H376><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "They have moved <S%H5265><s%> from here; <S%H2088><s%> for I heard <S%H8085><s%> [them] say, <S%H559><s%> 'Let us go <S%H1980><s%> to Dothan. <S%H1886><s%>'" So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after his brothers <S%H251><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> them at Dothan. <S%H1886><s%>

When they saw <S%H7200><s%> him from a distance <S%H7350><s%> and before <S%H2962><s%> he came <S%H7126><s%> close <S%H7126><s%> to them, they plotted <S%H5230><s%> against <S%H854><s%> him to put <S%H4191><s%> him to death. <S%H4191><s%>
And they said <S%H559><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> this <S%H1976><s%> dreamer <S%H1167><s%>! <S%H2472><s%>

"Now <S%H6258><s%> then, come <S%H1980><s%> and let us kill <S%H2026><s%> him and throw <S%H7993><s%> him into one <S%H259><s%> of the pits; <S%H953><s%> and we will say, <S%H559><s%> 'A wild <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%> him.' Then let us see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> of his dreams! <S%H2472><s%>"
But Reuben <S%H7205><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> [this] and rescued <S%H5337><s%> him out of their hands <S%H3027><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us not take <S%H5221><s%> his life. <S%H5315><s%>"

Reuben <S%H7205><s%> further said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Shed <S%H8210><s%> no <S%H408><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%> Throw <S%H7993><s%> him into this <S%H2088><s%> pit <S%H953><s%> that is in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> but do not lay <S%H7971><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> on him" â€“ that he might rescue <S%H5337><s%> him out of their hands, <S%H3027><s%> to restore <S%H7725><s%> him to his father.

So it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H9201><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> reached <S%H935><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> that they stripped <S%H6584><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> of his tunic, <S%H3801><s%> the varicolored <S%H6446><s%> tunic <S%H3801><s%> that was on him;
and they took <S%H3947><s%> him and threw <S%H7993><s%> him into the pit. <S%H953><s%> Now the pit <S%H953><s%> was empty, <S%H7386><s%> without <S%H369><s%> any water <S%H4325><s%> in it.

Then they sat <S%H3427><s%> down <S%H3427><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> a meal. <S%H3899><s%> And as they raised <S%H5375><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> a caravan <S%H736><s%> of Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%> was coming <S%H935><s%> from Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> with their camels <S%H1581><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> aromatic <S%H5219><s%> gum <S%H5219><s%> and balm <S%H6875><s%> and myrrh, <S%H3910><s%> on their way <S%H1980><s%> to bring <S%H3381><s%> [them] down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> profit <S%H1215><s%> is it for us to kill <S%H2026><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> up his blood <S%H1818><s%>?

"Come <S%H1980><s%> and let us sell <S%H4376><s%> him to the Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%> and not lay <S%H1961><s%> our hands <S%H3027><s%> on him; for he is our brother, <S%H251><s%> our [own] flesh. <S%H1320><s%>" And his brothers <S%H251><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> [to him.]

Then some <S%H376><s%> Midianite <S%H4084><s%> traders <S%H5503><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> by, so they pulled <S%H4900><s%> [him] up and lifted <S%H5927><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> out of the pit, <S%H953><s%> and sold <S%H4376><s%> him to the Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%> for twenty <S%H6242><s%> [shekels] of silver. <S%H3701><s%> Thus they brought <S%H935><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Now Reuben <S%H7205><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to the pit, <S%H953><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was not in the pit; <S%H953><s%> so he tore <S%H7167><s%> his garments. <S%H899><s%>
And he returned <S%H7725><s%> to his brothers <S%H251><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "The boy <S%H3206><s%> is not [there;] as for me, where <S%H575><s%> am I to go <S%H935><s%>?"

So they took <S%H3947><s%> Joseph's tunic, <S%H3801><s%> and slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> a male <S%H8163><s%> goat, <S%H8163><s%> and dipped <S%H2881><s%> the tunic <S%H3801><s%> in the blood; <S%H1818><s%>

and they sent <S%H7971><s%> the varicolored <S%H6446><s%> tunic <S%H3801><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it to their father and said, <S%H1><s%> "We found <S%H559><s%> this; <S%H4672><s%> please <S%H2088><s%> examine <S%H4994><s%> [it] to [see] whether it is your son's tunic <S%H5234><s%> or <S%H3801><s%> not."

Then he examined <S%H5234><s%> it and said, <S%H559><s%> "It is my son's tunic. <S%H3801><s%> A wild <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> has devoured <S%H398><s%> him; Joseph <S%H3130><s%> has surely <S%H2963><s%> been torn <S%H2963><s%> to pieces! <S%H2963><s%>"

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> tore <S%H7167><s%> his clothes, <S%H8071><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> on his loins, <S%H4975><s%> and mourned <S%H56><s%> for his son <S%H1121><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Then all <S%H3605><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his daughters <S%H1323><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> to comfort <S%H5162><s%> him, but he refused <S%H3985><s%> to be comforted. <S%H5162><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Surely <S%H3588><s%> I will go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> in mourning <S%H57><s%> for my son. <S%H1121><s%>" So his father wept <S%H1><s%> for him.

Meanwhile, the Midianites <S%H4084><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> him in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Potiphar, <S%H6318><s%> Pharaoh's officer, <S%H5631><s%> the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the bodyguard. <S%H2876><s%>
